question: I WANT 2 know if u can do istikaraah 4 2 people at the same time
answer:
QUESTION
ASLAMUALIKUM MAULANA SAAB The thing is maulana my mum has told me about 2 girls whom ive never seen.what i want 2 know is can i do istikarah for both of these girls at the same time and do i have 2 see them before i pray my istikarah,its for marraige purposes..zazakallah for you time..and may allah swt reward you for this wonderfull service you are giving..ammen
ANSWER


Share:
You may make Istikhaara for both the ladies. It is not necessary to see them
before Istikhaara.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Moulana Imraan Vawda
